alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:13PM EDT until July 08 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF COLLETON...BERKELEY AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 612 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Givhans, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 554 PM EDT, Colleton County 911 dispatch reported a tree down near Round O. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Summerville, Givhans Ferry State Park, Dorchester, Ridgeville, Cottageville, Round O, Givhans, Jedburg and Knightsville. This warning includes I-26 between mile markers 185 and 192. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
